errors.error_description: The instructions incorrectly advise installing numpy separately, which is redundant as it is a core dependency of libEnsemble and will be installed automatically by pip.
correction_candidates: Replace the two `pip install` commands with a single command: `pip install libensemble`.
Change the commands to `pip install "numpy<2" libensemble`.
Combine the commands into `pip install numpy libensemble`.
errors.golden_answer: Replace the two `pip install` commands with a single command: `pip install libensemble`.
